definitions.definition: the state of being important or famous.
examples: she came to prominence as an artist in the 1960s
synonyms: rank More"his rise to prominence"good coverage
top billing "the press gave prominence to the reports"

definitions.definition: the fact or condition of standing out from something by physically projecting or being particularly noticeable.
examples: radiographs showed enlargement of the right heart with prominence of the pulmonary outflow tract

definitions.definition: a thing that projects from something, especially a projecting feature of the landscape or a protuberance on a part of the body.
a stream of incandescent gas projecting above the sun's chromosphere.
